# API Reference
The Auth0 SDK classes all reside within the `Auth0\SDK` namespace. You can learn more about these classes and methods from the hierarchy below.

**[Exception →](Exception)**  
**[Store →](Store)**  
**[Token →](Token)**  
**[Utility →](Utility)**
